p: A total of 2143 unique articles and journalistic essays satisfied the inclusion criteria, for the period 1989â€“2013 inclusive. The full database is available in the supplementary material. This shows the year, lead author (at least), journal, title and primary search method. It also lists the number of Google Scholar citations and the date these were identified. Table A1 ( Appendix) tabulates the primary search method of papers, by each year.
